snippet: A forthcoming biography portrays the presidential candidate, who received draft deferments, as preoccupied by winning and self-promotion since childhood.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump told author of coming biography that he always felt that he was in the military because of his education at military-themed boarding school; claim may raise eyebrows due to fact that Trump has no actual military service; book, Never Enough: Donald Trump and the Pursuit of Success by Michael D'Antonio, is set for publication later in September.
lead_paragraph: A forthcoming biography portrays the presidential candidate, who received draft deferments, as preoccupied by winning and self-promotion since childhood.

headline.main: Donald Trump Likens His Schooling to Military Service in Book
headline.print_headline: Trump Likens His Schooling to Military Service in Book

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Never Enough: Donald Trump and the Pursuit of Success (Book)
